overview: On vacation from Mexico, wealthy man-children Oscar and Arturo are causing havoc in New York City, partying like thereâ€™s no tomorrow. Their sense of entitlement is only outmatched by their unchecked stamina. Amidst the debauchery, the two get caught up in a Homeland security investigation that threatens to derail their amusement. This rambunctious comedy of mistaken identities and sexual promiscuity is a riot from start to finish.
title: The Sky is Blue
